interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) Review Date: 2019/05/04 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} Review Text: I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. Review Title: HAIR IS GARBAGE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong preference for high-quality hair products, particularly human hair.
- **Value for Money:** Discontent with overpriced products that do not meet quality expectations; values transparency in pricing and product description.
- **Experience with Vendors:** Skeptical of vendor integrity, particularly regarding refund policies and customer service; prefers sellers who prioritize customer satisfaction.
- **Sentiment Towards Reviews:** Relying heavily on detailed reviews, especially negative ones, to inform purchasing decisions; perceives negative reviews as more credible.
- **Feedback and Resolution:** Expects effective resolutions from sellers when products do not meet standards; likely to reject products that result in dissatisfaction, leading to a potential search for alternatives. 
- **Overall Attitude:** Disappointed with misleading quality claims; seeks honest recommendations and actively warns others about unreliable products.
